name: Learn bambara
description: Linguarena is a new way to learn languages and to improve your level. With our intuitive, fun and addictive method, memorize words, phrases and sentences in no time. 5 to 10 minutes a day are enough to reach a fluent level in 2 to 4 months.  Give Linguarena Bambara a try, its free ! 2 lessons offered and 76 words, phrases and sentences to memorize with the memorization tool based on SRS (spaced repetition system).  Texts of the Linguarena bambara have been written by a bambara teacher; audio pronunciations made by native bambara speakers.  No need for monthly subscription, download additional content and enjoy permanently !  Features in this app :  Memorization tool based on SRS (spaced repetition system) to memorize 859 words, phrases and useful sentences.  3 methods of memorization : with cards, writting and audio.  15 lessons, each containing :  - 2 warm ups sections that prepare for the dialogue  - An audio and written dialogue.  - 1 vocabulary section composed of two sub sections : vocabulary of the dialogue and thematic vocabulary.  - A cultural note to discover the bambara lifestyle.  A lexicon with integrated search engine to easily find a word or phrase or sentence in bambara or in english.  Statistics to track your progress  The bambara alphabet.
